statements: UPDATE feedback_reviews SET review = 'Great service! 5 stars' WHERE feedback_id = 101;
UPDATE feedback_reviews SET rating = 4.7, customer_name = 'Alice' WHERE feedback_id = 102;
UPDATE feedback_reviews SET rating = 4.5, review = 'Great service!' WHERE feedback_id = 12345;
UPDATE feedback_reviews SET customer_name = 'John Doe', timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE rating > 3.0 AND customer_name = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_reviews SET service_rating = 5, review_text = 'Excellent experience' WHERE review_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Good experience', rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_reviews SET review_text = 'Highly recommended service!', service_rating = 9 WHERE customer_id = 201 AND review_id = 301;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET rating = 4, feedback_text = 'Great service!' WHERE feedback_id = 101
UPDATE ServiceImprovements SET completion_date = '2022-08-15 10:00:00' WHERE improvement_id = 201
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Improved customer experience' WHERE feedback_id = 123;
UPDATE CustomerReviews SET review_text = 'Excellent service and products' WHERE rating > 4;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number='+1234567890' WHERE customer_id='ec0a0244-2963-4b17-bc0d-6c9b2698f405';
UPDATE products SET price=49.99, category='Electronics' WHERE product_id='ae2ff703-d02f-40d0-947a-c63b0978defe';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email_address = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 'a13e7c47-9fab-49fb-b84c-2f5d6f7e810c';
UPDATE products SET price = 19.99, description = 'High-quality product', category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = '79b76e0e-469d-4be7-90c1-72f26d4643da';
UPDATE Customers SET email_address = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE Products SET price = 29.99, stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 456;
UPDATE Customers SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET price = 19.99, stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 1 WHERE product_id = 5;
